qa-2026-02-10-e2e-major-failure-rate.title: Full E2E Chromium run still not clean
qa-2026-02-10-e2e-major-failure-rate.details: Targeted rerun on 2026-02-11 still failed 5/5 selected specs (`audit-logs`, `hub-flow`, `llm-generate`). A complete green full-suite validation remains blocked.

qa-2026-02-11-e2e-mock-route-interceptio.title: Playwright API mocks do not reliably intercept critical frontend requests
qa-2026-02-11-e2e-mock-route-interceptio.details: Even with wildcard routes and OPTIONS handling, `audit-logs`, `hub-flow`, and `llm-generate` still hit live backend paths and produce 404-driven UI errors. Tests need a deterministic mocking strategy that cannot be bypassed by app-level network traffic.

qa-2026-02-10-local-test-services-health.title: Locally spawned E2E services show intermittent internal health read timeouts
qa-2026-02-10-local-test-services-health.details: Reproduced on 2026-02-11 (`localhost:5501/health`, `localhost:5502/health` read timeouts) during setup and run. This still contributes to non-deterministic startup and flakiness.

qa-2026-02-10-hub-flow-timeout.title: Hub flow E2E fails to complete local task execution path
qa-2026-02-10-hub-flow-timeout.details: `tests/hub-flow.spec.ts` remains red on 2026-02-11. POST execute response is observed, but expected visible completion signal in UI is still missing in test context.

qa-2026-02-10-audit-logs-fixture-asserti.title: Audit logs E2E does not render expected seeded rows
qa-2026-02-10-audit-logs-fixture-asserti.details: `tests/audit-logs.spec.ts` remains reproducibly red on 2026-02-11 (`user-0` row not visible). Mocked list payload is not reflected in rendered table during test run.

qa-2026-02-10-llm-suite-contract.title: LLM suites need clear separation of mock and live-provider paths
qa-2026-02-10-llm-suite-contract.details: `llm-generate.spec.ts` failed all three assertions again on 2026-02-11. Expected mocked responses are not consistently visible; UI still shows 404-driven error notifications in empty-response scenario.

qa-2026-02-10-e2e-hub-healthcheck-timeou.title: waitForHub setup timeout mitigated but still noisy
qa-2026-02-10-e2e-hub-healthcheck-timeou.details: `waitForHub` still logs frequent readiness failures (`Hub healthcheck still failing...`) in reruns on 2026-02-11. Startup is survivable but noisy and timing-sensitive.

qa-2026-02-10-teams-templates-api-e2e.title: Teams and templates API E2E flows still need full-run confirmation
qa-2026-02-10-teams-templates-api-e2e.details: Current focus run did not include teams/templates suites. Post-fix full-run confirmation is still pending once core failing suites are stabilized.

qa-2026-02-10-e2e-log-noise-404-endpoint.title: Reduce recurring 404 noise for /events and /stats/history
qa-2026-02-10-e2e-log-noise-404-endpoint.details: Repeated 404s on `/events` and `/stats/history` were pervasive across all 2026-02-11 reruns and continue to obscure actionable failures.

qa-2026-02-10-e2e-bootstrap-performance.title: E2E global setup spends time on repeated startup work
qa-2026-02-10-e2e-bootstrap-performance.details: Using `ANANTA_SKIP_PIP=1` helps, but repeated multi-service startup still dominates runtime for iterative debugging.

qa-2026-02-10-overcommit-warning.title: Redis vm.overcommit_memory host warning
qa-2026-02-10-overcommit-warning.details: Redis host tuning warning remains non-blocking but unresolved.
